page.title: 10Local Playground Games
page.content: {CHUCK:}You have to throw the ball to the other side of the playground and try to get it dropped onto the grass there.Two teams of any number can play. {KISS CATCH:}is played between boys and girls.When a boy catches a girl he kisses her. {WHITELINE TIG: }One person is 'on'. The marked playground semicircle is safe.You must stay on the marked lines.If you meet someone you may change direction. {BULLDOG:}One person is 'on' to start with.Everybody else lines up and when 'Bulldog' is called runs to the opposite side.If anyone is caught they then switch sides and do the chasing with the original person who was 'on'.
